long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GJ Price Tracker Variants Importer is a tool to help you import your competitor variants in GJ Price Tracker in a simple way.

---

GJ Price Tracker is a competitor price monitoring tool that works automatically.

Start price tracking your competitors with variants and adjust your prices automatically using dynamic pricing. We help you find your competitors or add existing ones, matching their prices with yours, monitoring prices on autopilot, and save you a lot of time. You can use Price history chart to analyse trends over time. Set up e-mail alerts to get notified whenever a competitor changes their prices. Activate auto-repricing rules to automatically adjust your prices and boost your profits.

Install on Shopify: https://apps.shopify.com/price-tracker
